titleStmt.title: Christs prayer vpon the Crosse for his enemies Father forgiue them, for they know not what they doe / by Sir Io. Hayward ...
titleStmt.author: Hayward, John, Sir, 1564?-1627.

notesStmt.note: Imperfect: tightly bound, with slight loss of print.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
